sphere-delight.title: Chocolate Sphere Delight
sphere-delight.desc: This chocolate sphere delight is a decadent dessert that will satisfy any chocolate craving. A sphere of rich chocolate mousse, creamy vanilla ice cream, and a drizzle of dark chocolate sauce

tiramisu.title: Modern Tiramisu
tiramisu.desc: A visually stunning reinterpretation of the classic tiramisu. This deconstructed dessert showcases individual components like coffee jelly, airy mascarpone foam, and a delicate ladyfinger crumble. The arrangement on the plate invites the diner to assemble their own unique bites

ramen-night-in.title: Ramen Night in
ramen-night-in.desc: Cozy up and enjoy a delicious bowl of homemade ramen featuring a flavorful broth, al dente noodles, tender pork slices, soft-boiled eggs, and a medley of colorful vegetables

decadent-cake.title: Decadent Chocolate Layer Cake
decadent-cake.desc: An irresistible chocolate layer cake adorned with a rich dark chocolate ganache glaze and a scattering of fresh raspberries. This decadent dessert is sure to satisfy any chocolate lover

molecular-gastronomy.title: Molecular Gastronomy
molecular-gastronomy.desc: This molecular gastronomy masterpiece uses spheres, textures, and colors to create a visually stunning and innovative dessert
